name: Social Education Economical Development Society
briefDescription: SEEDS is a non-governmental organization promoted by a Gandhian worker Mr. S.D. Pandian who had been associating with the Sarvodaya Movement of Tamilnadu.    Since 1995, SEEDS,   registered under Tamilnadu Societies registration Act 1975, undertook socio economic development activities in Virudhunagar district which are one of the backward districts in Tamilnadu, India. The mandate of the organization is to enable the marginalized and disadvantaged urban and rural communities to achieve their socio-economic development through the process of awareness building, organization and right based empowerment activities.  SEEDS has been covering 10,000 families in the blocks of Aruppukottai, Thiruchuli and Kariyapatti in Virudhunagar District of Tamilnadu.Main purpose of SEEDS is to women empowerment and poverty alleviation of unorganized women labour.Totally 700 SHG groups are formulated and promoted. And 5000 unorganized women are organized provide livelihood assistance.The major develop- mental activities of SEEDS are grouped as; women rights, child rights, women empowerment, livelihood promotion, micro credit, educational and nutritional supply to poor children, supply of clean water to disadvantaged School Children, sustainable agriculture,  watershed development program to farmers ecology and environmental protection, and social security to unorganized workers.
